description: The initiative focuses on the development and commercialization of mycorrhizal fungi, which enhance soil health and crop productivity. Founded 20 years ago by a family passionate about agriculture, the company has evolved from traditional practices to innovative biotechnological solutions. With a commitment to organic farming, they produce high-quality mycorrhizae that improve nutrient absorption in various crops. Their goal is to restore soils, promote sustainable agriculture, and expand their market presence both nationally and internationally.
name: Suppra
